p: The S protein functions in the form of highly glycosylated 3D complexes (Zheng et al. 2018; Parsons et al. 2019) provide the interaction of the virion with the receptors of epithelial cells followed by the internalization of the viral genome (Li 2016). The S protein also is known as the spike protein of SARS-CoV-2 which crystal structure described (Wang et al. 2020b).
